scripts.dev: export $(cat .env | xargs) && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc && rm -r ./dist/public/* || true && rm -r ./dist/views/* || true && cp -r public/* ./dist/public/ && bash minify.sh && cp -r views/* ./dist/views/ && node ./dist/server/server.js
scripts.devfr: rm -r ./dist/public/* || true && rm -r ./dist/views/* || true && cp -r public/* ./dist/public && cp -r views/* ./dist/views/
scripts.helm-package: sudo docker build -t crater-sh . && sudo docker save crater-sh:latest | sudo k3s ctr images import - && sudo helm package ./infra/helm
scripts.helm-delete: helm delete "$(helm ls | grep crater-sh | awk '{print $1}')"
scripts.helm-full: npm run helm-package && npm run helm-delete && npm run helm-install
